attributes.action: Hold politicians accountable for the Brexit billions lost from the UK economy.
attributes.additional_details:
Research was already conducted confirming the estimated losses yet politicians did not educate the electorate sufficiently and played emotional politics as well as spread untruths which resulted in the worst case scenario for the UK where millions will suffer. 

The current turmoil and voters regret proves that people did not make a fully informed decision and were not sufficiently made aware of the facts presented in the following document: 
http://cep.lse.ac.uk/pubs/download/brexit02.pdf
attributes.background:
Because of Brexit the the damage to the economy has been rapid and catastrophic yet nobody has been held accountable for this gross negligence that is going to affect the lives of everyone in the UK. 

We demand a public enquiry into the matter and accountability.
